definitions.title: n.[m.]
definitions.body: thickness;—cstr. [[נַּבֵּי מָגִנׇּיו]] ´[[ע]] Job 15:26 the thickness (stoutness) of the bosses of his shields (in fig.); sf. [[עָבְיוֹ]] its thickness, of the molten sea 1Ki 7:26 = 2Ch 4:5; of pillar Je 52:21.—2Ch 4:17 v. foll.—Under [[עבה]] belongs perh. also [[בְּעַב הֶעָנׇן]] Ex 19:9 (rd. [[בַּעֲבִי]] ?) in the thickness of the clouds, cf. Bu:Th Lz 1892 (3), 63 Kö:ii 1, 86.
